Articles.Content:
The Kennethian Institute of Space Studies (KISS) would enjoy the opportunity to offer piloting services, if still desired.

If you give me a mission I can construct you a vessel to complete it.
Orbital station that looks like Ender's game. xD

Orbital station that looks like Ender's game. xD

Ahh, man! I haven't seen that film yet and this means I'm gonna have to google for spoilers!

Only kidding, i'm sure knowing what the station looks like isn't gonna spoil anything major!

Ahh, man! I haven't seen that film yet and this means I'm gonna have to google for spoilers!

Only kidding, i'm sure knowing what the station looks like isn't gonna spoil anything major!

xD It'd be super tough to build a station like that I'm guessing. You can build it if you want! I think it'd be cool.

And yes its a great movie! only thing I was disappointed in was switching the asteroid base location. AWESOME EFFECTS!!!!

I haven't seen it yet, but from what I gathered from the trailers I got a bad feeling about it.

Is it one of those films where there's like a massive war going on with millions of people dying, yet they want you to fell sorry for 1 poor boy who gets tortured or something? It's just I get really pissed off at those films.

I haven't seen it yet, but from what I gathered from the trailers I got a bad feeling about it.

Is it one of those films where there's like a massive war going on with millions of people dying, yet they want you to fell sorry for 1 poor boy who gets tortured or something? It's just I get really pissed off at those films.

No, not really. It's a good book/movie. ANYWAYS, BACK ON TOPIC PEOPLE.

Greetings from Hafner & Co.!

I've made a lot of progress on my Vall mission meant explore and study the moon and here I am to show you guys!

Uploaded on imgur to reduce space: http://imgur.com/a/uS9nJ

Hope you all like it!

I feel like a bit of an idiot asking, but where do I get an assignment/mission? Did I fall asleep for a second during the ISSO Piloting Orientation and miss it?

Better to ask then do than to sit confused I suppose.
Well, to be honest, go do one on your own! I think it's about time I cut the leash and let you all do assigments on your own. Just post on here to let us know what you're doing

Hey everyone! Just going to share my latest little... project, on creating some SSTO aircraft, that can deliver small probes and such to interplanetary ships (and stuff!). But anyways, considering that I am an engineer, I thought that I would post these! But, considering I just started these, they are no where near being cargo shuttles, but thats what I'm working on

SSTO

EDIT: Stupid sig, slicing yourself in half like that! Anyone else seeing this? \/ \/ \/ \/ \/ ? Anything?!

Edited November 7, 2013 by Redwork Studios|Redwork1
I 'think' that this might have a minor case, of a severe dead thread
Hm. I'll get a mission to Gilleh soon.
Zokesia Would happily provide launching service for small probes (up to 6 tons)...
It's an honor to have Zokesia Skunkworks contracting with ISSO. Welcome to the ISSO.

Well, everyone, you have my regards, I was glad to accomplish my 1 assigned munar mission and had alot of fun watching this, sadly, not much has happened for a month now, and that cant be a good sign. Unless this serves as a rally for this to get totally revamped, I dont think much else will happen here

Best Regards,

Redwork Studios

Redwork One

Redwork Two

Redwork Three
Never fear! The Jedi Master is here! I can start a new version of this if anyone is interested.

You guys, I just said that you guys were free to do whatever sciencey things you want and to report them! When I said "I'm cutting you guys loose." I didn't mean "Get Out!" Now, if anyone wants an assignment, gimme a hoot
UPDATE: I just made a Google Drive database. Tell me your Drive name if you want to be included in it.
Also, here's a link to it. You don't need a Drive account to view it.
I suggest you remove the ISA MapSat requirement, since it has not been properly updated to my knowledge.
Okay, thanks.
With that out of the way, I'd like to join. I'm the Jedi Space Program. I could do some gravity tests on Minmus if you like (kerbal jumping, rovers going over hills, that sort of thing).
OK, what type of member? Pilot?
Yeah, pilot. It's just as well, my designs lately have been... questionable. I'd be willing to supply my own ships, though.

I, IHazJaffaz would like to join with my Jaffa Space Program (JSP).

I'd also want to be a pilot.

Edit:

I will be using and suggesting the RemoteTech mod.

Edited January 6, 2014 by IHazJaffaz
